metadata.title: CVE-2019-10167 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The virConnectGetDomainCapabilities() libvirt API, versions 4.x.x before4.10.1 and 5.x.x before 5.4.1, accepts an "emulatorbin" argument to specifythe program providing emulation for a domain. Since v1.2.19, libvirt willexecute that program to probe the domain's capabilities. Read-only clientscould specify an arbitrary path for this argument, causing libvirtd toexecute a crafted executable with its own privileges.

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
